column1: I appreciate the @MoCattle’s support of legislation I’m sponsoring called the Market Transparency Act. This legislation would increase price transparency in the cattle market to help farmers & ranchers recover from COVID. https://t.co/6PNwBMmZAj
I will always look out for America’s families and businesses. Before China misled us about the coronavirus I was already working on bills to hold China accountable. https://t.co/Jq6q3x4uXX

Today is Old Farmer’s Day in honor of the hard labor of farmers throughout American history including during the pandemic. As one of the few farmers in Congress I’m working on bills to help farmers and ranchers recover from the coronavirus.
As the coronavirus spread to more rural counties I championed efforts to ensure that rural hospitals and health care providers have the resources they need to help new COVID patients.

There is no evidence that other countries can contract coronavirus from food and food packaging produced in the US. I’m glad the Secretary of Agriculture is working to identify unfair trading restrictions that try to limit US exports of food.  https://t.co/zwLqYDrIRh

I appreciate the efforts of @realDonaldTrump to fight the coronavirus and begin rebuilding the economy. If it were Joe Biden in the White House he would prevent our economy from moving forward: https://t.co/1Ppg0EBteO.
